Method.name: ProtectDefaultBranches
Method.Description:
Protect default branches in organization.
Org - name of Organization
Username - GitHub user, whois organisation owner
Password - GitHub password, corresponding to Username.
Method.Implementation: Set api = ##class(GitHub.API).%New(Username,Password) #dim repos As List of %ZEN.proxyObject Set st = api.GetOrgRepos(Org, "public", .repos) Write $System.Status.GetErrorText(st) For i=1:1:repos.Count() { Set repo = repos.GetAt(i).name Set branch = repos.GetAt(i)."default_branch" Set st = api.ProtectBranch(Org, repo, branch) Write repo, " ", $System.Status.GetErrorText(st), ! }
